PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04722010-04-08,  ,  ,  ,  HRSD
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE (EI) REGULATIONS to extend and implement new rate calculation formulae to phase out the application of the transitional measures over a period of two years for two economic regions (Madawaska-Charlotte in New Brunswick and Lower St. Lawrence and North Shore in Quebec) are scheduled to come to an end on April 10, 2010. The amendments also provide for the transitional measures to cease to have effect if, the unemployment rate in the region, based on transitional calculation, no longer provides a benef it after March 12, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0081 Publication Date: 2010-04-28
AttachmentsAttachment
